greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of phi(x^3) * psi(x^4) - x * phi(x) * psi(x^12) in powers of x where phi(), psi() are Ramanujan theta functions.
comment: Ramanujan theta functions: f(q) (see A121373), phi(q) (A000122), psi(q) (A010054), chi(q) (A000700).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Michael Somos, Introduction to Ramanujan theta functions
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Ramanujan Theta Functions
mathematica: a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ (EllipticTheta[ 3, 0, x^3] EllipticTheta[ 2, 0, x^2] - EllipticTheta[ 3, 0, x] EllipticTheta[ 2, 0, x^6]) / (2 x^(1/2)), {x, 0, n}]; (* _Michael Somos_, Jul 12 2015 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<0, 0, n = 2*n + 1; sumdiv(n, d, kronecker(-12, d) * kronecker(2, n/d)))};
(PARI) {a(n) = my(A); if( n<0, 0, A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( eta(x + A) * eta(x^2 + A) * eta(x^8 + A) * eta(x^12 + A)^3 / (eta(x^3 + A) * eta(x^4 + A)^2 * eta(x^24 + A)), n))};
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Mar 11 2007
